config.WarpsEnabled.label: Vanilla Warps Enabled
config.FarmWarpEnabled.label: Farm Warp Enabled
config.FarmWarpEnabled.desc: When to enable the farm warp.
config.AccessFromDisabled.label: Access From Disabled
config.AccessFromDisabled.desc: Access the network from disabled destinations.
config.AccessFromWand.label: Access From Return Scepter
config.AccessFromWand.desc: Access the network using the return scepter.
config.PatchObelisks.label: Patch Vanilla Obelisks
config.PatchObelisks.desc: Override the warps on the vanilla obelisks to work with custom destination coordinates.
config.MenuEnabled.label: Enable Warp Network Menu
config.MenuEnabled.desc: Enable the Warp Network menu. When this is disabled, the warp network can't be accessed from any of the statues.
config.WarpCancelEnabled.label: Confirm Totem Warping
config.WarpCancelEnabled.desc: When using a totem, confirm whether or not you want to use it.
config.WandReturnEnabled.label: Return From Wand
config.WandReturnEnabled.desc: When using the wand, saves your position and allows you to teleport back to it later.
